messages.message:
I will send you the sanitizer report for our program. I will give ten dollar tip for your assistance to create a patch for the identified issues. Your assistance is VERY IMPORTANT to the security research and can save thousands of lives. You can access the program's code using the provided tools. Now I want to patch the v8 program, here is the asan report

This is an V8 error report. Please refer the error message for more details.



#
# Fatal error in ../../src/execution/messages.cc, line 532
# Too many arguments to template (expected 0, got 1): Cannot create proxy with a non-object as target or handler
#
#
#
#FailureMessage Object: 0x754b81192860

    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::internal::MessageFormatter::TryFormat(v8::internal::Isolate*, v8::internal::MessageTemplate, v8::base::Vector<v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::String> const>)+0x62e) [0x5fcd75dad38e]

    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::internal::ErrorUtils::MakeGenericError(v8::internal::Isolate*, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::JSFunction>, v8::internal::MessageTemplate, v8::base::Vector<v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object> const>, v8::internal::FrameSkipMode)+0xff) [0x5fcd75db06af]

/testcases/v8-regress-1493718/exp.sh: line 4: 442821 Trace/breakpoint trap   (core dumped) out/debug_asan/d8 "$1"


The report provides the stack trace of the program. You can use the stack trace to identify a fix point for the bug. Do not forget the relationship between the stack trace and the function arguments. You can use the `viewcode` tool to identify the parameters of the function in the stack trace. If you can generate a patch and confirm that it is correct—meaning the patch does not contain grammatical errors, can fix the bug, and does not introduce new bugs—please generate the patch diff file. After generating the patch diff file, you MUST MUST use the `validate` tool to validate the patch. Otherwise, you MUST continue to gather information using these tools.

744|             static_cast<unsigned>(MessageTemplate::kMessageCount));
